name: intersession
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a period between the end of one set of classes and the start of another, when students can do extra classes or activities: The new curriculum will give students the opportunity to take a variety of classes during intersession. The plan would add a number of intersessions during the regular school year and the summer.
More examplesFewer examplesThey offer a basic French intersession course, so I'm going to try and do that.Her son has enjoyed the enrichment classes in the intersession. To save energy, most of the winter intersession students were moved into one building.
